name: Sunset Desert Adventure
description: Experience the magical Agafay Desert as the sun sets over the stone desert landscape, creating a breathtaking backdrop for an unforgettable ATV adventure.
highlights: Ride through diverse rocky terrain and rolling dunes
Traditional Moroccan tea at a scenic overlook
notIncluded: Hotel pickup and drop-off (available for additional fee)

itinerary.title: Welcome & Safety Briefing
itinerary.description: Meet at our Agafay Desert base camp for a welcome orientation and safety briefing. Get familiar with your ATV and receive basic training.

itinerary.title: Rocky Trail Exploration
itinerary.description: Begin your journey through the rugged stone desert landscape, navigating moderate terrain while taking in the dramatic scenery.

itinerary.title: Sunset Viewpoint
itinerary.description: Arrive at a panoramic viewpoint in time for sunset. Enjoy traditional Moroccan tea while watching the sun cast golden hues across the desert landscape.

itinerary.title: Return Ride
itinerary.description: Experience the thrill of riding as twilight sets in, with the landscape transformed by the evening light.

requirements: Minimum age: 16 years (with parental approval for minors)
Suitable for beginners to intermediate riders
cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the scheduled tour. Cancellations within 24 hours are subject to a 50% fee. No-shows are charged the full amount.
additionalInfo: Wear comfortable clothing and closed-toe shoes. Sunglasses and sunscreen recommended. Long pants advised for comfort and protection. Tour may be modified due to weather conditions.

reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning experience! The sunset was magical and our guide Sophie was extremely knowledgeable and professional. Highly recommend this tour!
Great adventure and amazing views. The ATVs were in good condition and easy to handle. Would have loved a bit more time at the viewpoint, but overall a great experience.
